quoteText:
This Agreement may not be modified except by a revised Terms of Service posted by Vimeo on the Vimeo Site or a written amendment signed by an authorized representative of Vimeo.
A revised Terms of Service will be effective as of the date it is posted on the Vimeo Site.</
title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
